  â”‚                                                            â”‚                                                        
  â”‚                      Claude Pilot ðŸš€                       â”‚                                                        
  â”‚   A powerful CLI tool for managing multiple Claude code    â”‚                                                        
  â”‚                          sessions                          â”‚                                                        
  â”‚                                                            â”‚                                                        
  â•°â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â•¯                                                        
                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                        
  Available Commands:                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                        
    create Create a new Claude session                                                                                  
    list List all active sessions                                                                                       
    attach Attach to a specific session                                                                                 
    kill Terminate a session                                                                                            
    kill-all Terminate all sessions                                                                                     
    tui Launch interactive terminal UI                                                                                  
                                                                                                                        
  Global Flags:                                                                                                         
    -o, --output string    Output format (human|table|json|ndjson|quiet) (default "human")                              
        --debug           Enable debug logging (overrides --verbose)                                                    
        --trace           Enable trace logging (overrides --debug and --verbose)                                        
        --no-color        Disable ANSI colors in output                                                                 
        --yes             Accept defaults for prompts (non-interactive mode)                                            
    -v, --verbose         Verbose output                                                                                
        --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.config/claude-pilot/claude-pilot.yaml)                         
                                                                                                                        
  Use "claude-pilot [command] --help" for more information about a command.                                             
         
  USAGE  
         
    claude-pilot [command] [--flags]  
            
  COMMANDS  
            
    attach [session-name-or-id] [--flags]  Attach to a Claude session for interactive communication
    completion [command]                   Generate the autocompletion script for the specified shell
    create [session-name] [--flags]        Create a new Claude session
    details --id <session-id> [--flags]    Show details for a specific Claude session
    help [command]                         Help about any command
    kill [session-name] [--flags]          Kill a Claude session
    list [--flags]                         List all active Claude sessions
    tui                                    Launch interactive terminal UI for managing Claude sessions
         
  FLAGS  
         
    --config                               Config file (default is $HOME/.config/claude-pilot/claude-pilot.yaml)
    --debug                                Enable debug logging (overrides --verbose)
    -h --help                              Help for claude-pilot
    --no-color                             Disable ANSI colors in output
    -o --output                            Output format (human|table|json|ndjson|quiet) (human)
    --trace                                Enable trace logging (overrides --debug and --verbose)
    -v --verbose                           Verbose output
    --version                              Version for claude-pilot
    --yes                                  Accept defaults for prompts (non-interactive mode)
